<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/1666ac9c5685328895f6480ad6b14d1e11c77025|patch 8.1.2287: using EndOfBuffer highlight in popup does not look good>
patch 8.1.2287: using EndOfBuffer highlight in popup does not look good

Problem:    Using EndOfBuffer highlight in popup does not look good.
Solution:   Do not EndOfBuffer highlight. (closes #5204)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2287: using EndOfBuffer highlight in popup does not look good · vim/vim@1666ac9
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2287: using EndOfBuffer highlight in popup does not look good · vim/vim@1666ac9
attachments.text: Problem: Using EndOfBuffer highlight in popup does not look good. Solution: Do not EndOfBuffer highlight. (closes #5204)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/5c6b6187ac51a4d8545e823c1be6cdf70cac8a57|patch 8.1.2288: not using all space when popup with "topleft" flips t…>
patch 8.1.2288: not using all space when popup with "topleft" flips to above

Problem:    Not using all space when popup with "topleft" flips to above.
Solution:   Recompute the height when a popup flips from below to above.
            (closes #5151)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2288: not using all space when popup with "topleft" flips t… · vim/vim@5c6b618
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2288: not using all space when popup with "topleft" flips t… · vim/vim@5c6b618
attachments.text: …o above Problem: Not using all space when popup with "topleft" flips to above. Solution: Recompute the height when a popup flips from below to above. (closes #5151)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c8234779790dd873acb88331c50988adf94cc383|patch 8.1.2289: after :diffsplit closing the window does not disable …>
patch 8.1.2289: after :diffsplit closing the window does not disable diff

Problem:    After :diffsplit closing the window does not disable diff.
Solution:   Add "closeoff" to 'diffopt' and add it to the default.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2289: after :diffsplit closing the window does not disable … · vim/vim@c823477
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2289: after :diffsplit closing the window does not disable … · vim/vim@c823477
attachments.text: …diff Problem: After :diffsplit closing the window does not disable diff. Solution: Add "closeoff" to 'diffopt' and add it to the default.

text:

patch 8.1.2290: autocommand test fails

Problem:    Autocommand test fails.
Solution:   Remove 'closeoff' from 'diffopt'.

attachments.title: patch 8.1.2290: autocommand test fails · vim/vim@a9aa86f
attachments.text: Problem: Autocommand test fails. Solution: Remove 'closeoff' from 'diffopt'.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/adf4aa200b026dce91dd169143ee8b93e848ec8b|patch 8.1.2291: memory leak when executing command in a terminal>
patch 8.1.2291: memory leak when executing command in a terminal

Problem:    Memory leak when executing command in a terminal.
Solution:   Free "argv". (Dominique Pelle, closes #5208)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2291: memory leak when executing command in a terminal · vim/vim@adf4aa2
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2291: memory leak when executing command in a terminal · vim/vim@adf4aa2
attachments.text: Problem: Memory leak when executing command in a terminal. Solution: Free "argv". (Dominique Pelle, closes #5208)
